title: The Curse of the Rodain
description: In a desperate race to stop a rebellion before it can happen, King Adathor’s kingdom hangs by a thread. His estranged son, long the secret pupil of the rebel leader, seeks to supplant him and has labored long to gain conspirators from both within and without the castle walls. In a secret meeting, Adathor believes he is about to discover who is behind the scheme to overthrow him only to end up crushed by the revelation that it is his own blood. Can he save his son, and his people, before they destroy themselves, or will he be toppled as the kingdom falls into chaos?All to eager to assist this plot against the crown is the age-old foe of Adathor’s people: the Rodain. Believing they have the masterstroke of victory, they unwittingly unseal a great evil that seeks the destruction of all and holds loyalty to none. In the end, will anyone be left standing, or will all fall to the Curse of the Rodain?
author: Ryan Archer
